summary:
Adds a follower to the game, which can be found just outside the house at the Whiterun Stables.
No quests or brawls needed for him to follow you!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a follower to the game, which can be found just outside the house at the Whiterun Stables.

He can\'t die, and if he turns hostile, he turns friendly right after!

No quests or brawls needed for him to follow you!


Artwork made by iSpectra, a talented artist that does requests!
If you got the bucks, please head over to his steam profile, and request something.
http://steamcommunity.com/id/ispectra/

My first mod, ever. Please give feedback and tell if theres any bugs.
author: SondreHG
